comment: A lot of coursework. Textbook/homework program is pricey and it's necessary. Uses D2L, Voicethread, and VHL, so stuff can be hard to locate but just refer to the weekly checklist and you'll get by. He answers emails pretty quickly and is generally helpful. This is not an easy course but it's also not super hard. I've signed up for his FREN2001.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Lots of homework

comment: He's a good teacher and the class is pretty easy. The only trouble I had with it was the weekly dialogues where you'd have to practice French with another person for a grade. I hate talking to people and a lot of the time everyone was busy/ already has a partner by the time I could log on. Not his fault, just something to keep in mind.

The only reason I'm giving him three stars is because he didn't teach all semester. It was all based on the expensive textbook. He seems to be a better in-person teacher. I took French in high school so it was easy but if this is your first french class I don't recommend it. Lots of partner speaking activities. He seems nice, just not good online.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Group projects

comment: Took this class for a good foundation. Not even sure why he says he teaches this class when everything is self-taught and all you can do is read the textbook ($250). I asked for outside sources for assistance and was repeatedly told to read the textbook. Very advanced, true beginner class and another shining example of a "teacher" who doesn't teach
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: He is a great teacher. He usually only speaks in French, but you catch on quickly. Participation is mandatory, and he makes you have conversations in class to practice. He is also very personable and there if you need anything or have questions. Tests are easy if you study a little and participate.
Love him. He is great as teacher.

Great class, great teacher, and he is very understanding what it means to be a college student. Will work with you and help you as much as possible. Test are fair and grading system is best in world. Recomend this class who anyone who needs an elective or just want to learn french.

GREAT professor, gives easy tests ... when taking this class, make sure you have extra time to spend in the language lab and in the conversation sessions. They are all required. Attendance is also strict so make sure to be in the class. I got all A's but missed 4 classes so he gave me a B
